title: Explore Mallorca by Vespa at Barceló Illetas Albatros
text:
Explore Mallorca by Vespa at Barceló Illetas Albatros Explore Mallorca by Vespa at Barceló Illetas Albatros Details Category: Hotel   13:30 This summer, Barceló Illetas Albatros is offering the opportunity to rent personalised Barceló Vespas for just 46€ (£32) per day including VAT. Set off along the coast and experience a real sense of adventure and fun as well as getting a taste of life as a local in Mallorca. Guests will have the freedom to explore the winding roads and historic sights of Palma or head further afield and discover hidden coves dotted along the island’s coastline surrounded by lush forests and mountains. 
Romantic and secluded, relaxed yet offering plenty of fun, the adults-only Barceló Illetas Albatros Resort in Mallorca is brilliantly located in an elevated position right on the seafront yet with Palma’s historic centre just a stone’s throw away. The cool, sophisticated vibe also makes it a popular retreat for both groups of friends and couples. The hotel’s guest rooms are well-designed, most have sea views and some have private Jacuzzis – an ideal spot for guests to relax and enjoy a glass of something chilled. The large swimming pool and Balinese style day bed also provide plenty of space to sunbathe and enjoy the stunning views. There is also a Thalasso Spa also offering a wide range of treatments.
